data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 3,320 believers in Sal against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sal, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sal, Cape Verde to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Sal.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sal to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Espargos
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Espargos, Sal, Cape Verde.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Sal, Cape Verde by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Sal.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Sal.
